data.meta_description: Description I have always been interested in Mary Magdalene, and when I saw this photo still from The Passion of the Christ I thought it was such a powerful image. Also I wanted to make sure that she was represented with the holy halo around her head signifying her Sainthood and closeness to Jesus. The background texture is from spiritsighs-stock [link] And the picture is from MonicaBelluccifan.com
